p.k: Theophilus London gained attention in 2011 with the release of his debut EP 'Lovers Holiday' and his debut album 'Timez Are Weird These Days'. At the 2015 edition of the French music festival Nuits Sonores, London presents his second album 'Vibes'.
p.d: Nuits Sonores has become one of the premium European festivals of innovative music. Starting out as an electronic music festival, the French music festival has broadened its musical scope over the years. Today it presents artists that share a pioneering spirit. One of them, Trinidadian-born American rapper and singer Theophilus London, gained media attention in 2011 with the release of his debut EP 'Lovers Holiday' and his following debut album 'Timez Are Weird These Days'. At the 2015 edition of Nuits Sonores, London presents his second album 'Vibes' to his Lyonnese audience.
